Introduction

Kyrin is a South Korean singer, model, and actress under Liz Entertainment. She is a former member of the pre-debut girl groups Milkyway as Geumju and Rainbow Girl. She is the twin sister of Windy, who was also a member of Milkyway as Jinju.
